mapper.select: select * from ( select e.*, rownum rn from ( select d.USER_NO, d.PRODUCT_NO, c.name, c.price, c.maker, c.kind_no, c.imageurl, c.remainderdate, c.countprice, c.halfprice from( select a.no, a.name, a.price, a.maker, a.kind_no, b.imageurl, ceil(a.expiry_date-sysdate) as remainderdate, (ceil(((f.DIS_PERCENT*0.01)*a.price)/7)) countprice, a.price*0.5 as halfprice from product a, BOARDSFILEPR b, productkind f where a.no=b.no and a.KIND_NO=f.NO) c, cart d where c.no = d.PRODUCT_NO and d.user_no=#{user_no}) e) where #{page_top}<=rn and rn<=#{page_bottom}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where user_no=#{user_no} and product_no=#{product_no}
